thread.title: Ground News - Tiny magnetic balls sold by Walmart recalled, regulators cite 7 dead and thousands hospitalized
thread.title_full: Ground News - Tiny magnetic balls sold by Walmart recalled, regulators cite 7 dead and thousands hospitalized

author: NBC News
title: Ground News - Tiny magnetic balls sold by Walmart recalled, regulators cite 7 dead and thousands hospitalized
text:
Summary by NBC News The U.S. Consumer Product Safety Commission on Thursday recalled small but powerful magnetic balls used as building blocks and stress relievers, citing thousands of hospitalizations and at least seven deaths due to similar products. Share menu More
